Detailed Description

A specialization of FloatDataConsumer which put data into a dataset.

A specialization of FloatDataConsumer class which works as a sink of data vectors. Data vectros will be stored in the internal DataSetFloat attribute. The DataSetFloat must have enough space for all consumed vectors.
